# <a name="turn-off-focused-inbox"></a><span data-ttu-id="80219-102">Isključivanje fokusirane prijemnog poštanskog sandučeta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80219-102">Turn off Focused Inbox</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="80219-103">Na vrhu stranice izaberite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80219-103">At the top of the page, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="80219-104">da biste otvorili okno sa postavkama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80219-104">to open the Settings pane.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="80219-105">U oknu sa postavkama premestite fokus sa **fokusirane na prijemno poštansko sanduče** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80219-105">In the Settings pane, move the **Focused Inbox** toggle to off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="80219-106">Za više informacija pogledajte odeljak [Isključivanje fokusirane prijemnog poštanskog sandučeta](https://support.office.com/article/f714d94d-9e63-4217-9ccb-6cb2986aa1b2?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy#bkmk_outlookcom).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="80219-106">For more information, see [Turn off Focused Inbox](https://support.office.com/article/f714d94d-9e63-4217-9ccb-6cb2986aa1b2?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy#bkmk_outlookcom).</span></span>
